public interface JboMessage

Defines methods for localizing exception messages for various target languages, and for message formatting.

Message-text localization occurs when the client calls getLocalizedMessage(), rather than at the time the exception occurs, because the client may need to present the message in a number of different languages.

Since:
JDeveloper 3.0
